name: Ensure you don't have hard-coded credentials in your source code because it could be retro-engineered by attackers.
Ensure you don't hardcode password in the source file, hackers can steal the information by retro-engineering your application (Javascript)
Ensure you don't hardcode password in the source file, hackers can steal the information by retro-engineering your application (Typescript)
Ensure not relying on the session ID provided by "request.getRequestedSessionId()"
Ensure you are not using "referer" header field in HTTP request
Always set an expiration time for an Http Session to improve security
Ensure invalidating HTTP Session during logout to avoid broken Authentication
Ensure specifying "PermitAll" or "user role" for URL(s) access to enforce security
